Author: Gateway#3763

You have as of 14/04/2019, now officially moved over down Hush Street to number 3 to a more flashy house. The keys you hold open both houses but no one wants the "old" contents to the house at number 2.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> We won't automatically turn off nodes like ZEC, that is not our jive. So people running full nodes can be adults and upgrade or do whatever they are doing, as described in the whitepaper. We don't force a chain on people, they can choose between the old insecure unsupported Hush v2 or the new shiny, secure Hush v3
